sentences.en: A thousand branches droop like fringes made of jade.
Adjustable droop makes load sharing between engines precise.
sentences.cn: 可调下垂,使负载共享之间的发动机,准确的.

sentences.en: His chest heaved and his body seemed to droop.
sentences.cn: 他的胸脯上下起伏,身子也好象衰颓了.

sentences.en: His eyelids began to droop (= close, because he was sleepy ) .
sentences.cn: 他的眼皮开始耷拉下来了。

sentences.en: His moustache seemed to droop further from the lack of good results.
sentences.cn: 由于结果差强人意,他的那两撇八字须垂得更低了.

sentences.en: In the droop of her lip there was something sensuous.
sentences.cn: 在她那下垂的嘴唇上的确有点儿敏感的意味.

sentences.en: On alert the ear should never droop, bend, or crease.
sentences.cn: 警惕时,耳朵决不下垂 、 弯曲 、 或折叠.

sentences.en: Pulses have fast rise and fall times , and minimal droop.
sentences.cn: 脉冲能迅速上升和下降, 减少误差.

sentences.en: See how they hang their heads and droop, and wither.
sentences.cn: 看!它们不是低着头,弯下腰, 就要枯萎了吗?

sentences.en: She was so tired, her eyelids were beginning to droop.
sentences.cn: 她太疲倦了，眼睑开始往下垂。

sentences.en: The heavy snow made the branches droop.
The plant needs some water – it’s starting to droop.
sentences.cn: 这株植物需要浇些水——它开始打蔫了。

sentences.en: Their shoulders droop, their head hangs down, their breathing shallow, their facial expression is slack.
sentences.cn: 他们的肩膀搭拉下来, 脑袋低垂, 呼吸急促, 脸色呆板.

sentences.en: Wisps of them lead or droop because there must always be leading and drooping.
sentences.cn: 缕缕白云或前行,或散去,这最自然不过了.

words.tran_cn: 下垂；弯曲；发蔫（droop的现在分词）

trans.tran_cn: 低垂, 凋萎, 萎靡
trans.tran_en: to hang or bend down, or to make something do this
